Docs.param: The row key of the entity to delete.

The If-Match value to be used for optimistic concurrency. If is specified, the operation will be executed unconditionally. If the value is specified, the operation will fail with a status of 412 (Precondition Failed) if the value of the entity in the table does not match. The default is to delete unconditionally.
Docs.summary: Add a DeleteEntity request to the batch.

Docs.summary: Adds an UpdateEntity request to the batch which updates the specified table entity of type , if it exists. If the is , the entity will be replaced. If the is , the property values present in the will be merged with the existing entity.
Docs.remarks: See for more information about the behavior of the .
